definition: Song Dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)

sentences.chinese: 到宋朝後，中國的宦遊文學出現了新的特點。

sentences.english: Wen Tianxiang was the prime minister of the Song Dynasty. He lost the battle against Yuan's army and was captured .

sentences.english: Figure engraving art in Tang and Song Dynasties showed different styles.
sentences.chinese: 在人物雕刻藝術上，唐朝和宋朝是具有不同風格的。

sentences.english: The Sung Dynasty contributed three great inventions to world civilization.
sentences.chinese: 宋朝爲世界文明做出了三大發明的貢獻。

definition: the Northern Song Dynasty (960-1127)
Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
the Southern Song dynasty (1127-1279)
the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Tang dynasty (618-907)
Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), founded by the Jurchen 女真[Nu:3 zhen1] people of North China, a precursor of the Mongol Yuan Dynasty
Song dynasty (960-1279)/used to distinguish it from 劉宋|刘宋 Song of Southern dynasties (420-479)
Western Xia dynasty 1038-1227 of Tangut people 黨項|党项 occupying modern Ningxia and parts of Gansu and Shaanxi, overthrown by Mongols
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)
